title: Just oce things
body:
Had a ranked game just now, with a shaco jungle

He had ignite so i assumed he was going for invades and early ganks but nope, he farmed his own jg for a while, me and my friend ask him to gank bot and he just tells us to stfu

Meanwhile the enemy jg has ganked every lane at least 3 times and has total control of the map like literally no where is safe, cant even walk to lane without reksai popping over the wall with blitzcrank and the adc right behind her, shaco than dies in his jg and afks in base spamming abilites, we ask the enemy team to report him but they just say "you guys are fucking shit ez game"

LIKE REALLY 
 
and in the end i bet no one even reported the shaco who stood in base spamming abilites so he just gets out of the game with no punishment

replies.body: 1. No if u cant even buy more than 2 wards in game you don't deserve to win so PLz....... stop blaming jg, not only this ward your lanes and avoide ganks, if you pushed hard already stay back basics simple

we did ward it didnt stop them from full on tower diving everytime we got in lane, and HE DIDNT GANK ONCE EVEN WHEN THEY WERE PUSHED TO OUR TOWER, we asked for help, he told us to stfu, dont even try to defend him

I check it up he was bad, its not ur fault tbh,


my bad didn't check

> [{quoted}](name=Professor Cigg,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=mEWMNzwf,comment-id=,timestamp=2016-08-21T05:09:03.488+0000)
>  me and my friend ask him to gank bot and he just tells us to stfu

duuuuude. you need to go into a game prepared for a 1v9
in bronze, the first teamfight starts in championselect

This is OCE low elo. It's fucking terribad. It starts getting good about high silver but even then they still make some bad choices in plays.

Like I had a Riven top against me, she was silver 2 and playing very safe because I was outplaying her but her bronze 2 jungle kept trying to gank me, dying and feeding me, he then called her a noob. He lost the game hard, after the game the riven was explaining how she was duo queue with the adc which wanted to jg. 
Massive difference in game play between b2 jg and s2 top.
it just gets frustrating watching people play this game with no fucking idea what they are doing. It's worse in ranked because you lose LP and mmr because of them.
